html: <bob-panel id='content'>
@slot:header-content
<tooldrawer-cluster>

<tooldrawer-field-content-layout group-label='' type='choice-tiles' size='md' path='type' label='Layout' value='{{type}}' options='[{"label":"Grid","value":"grid","icon":"circle.grid.2x2"},{"label":"Carousel","value":"carousel","icon":"ellipsis"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field-content-logos group-label='' class='diet-object-manager' type='object-manager' path='strips' add-label='Add strip' reorder-label='Manage strips' reorder-title='Manage strips' label-path='logos.0.name' index-token='__STRIP__' default-item='{"logos":[{"name":"New logo","asset":{"name":"","source":"user"},"logoFill":"transparent","href":"","targetBlank":false,"nofollow":false,"alt":"","title":"","caption":""}]}' template='<tooldrawer-field type="repeater" size="md" path="strips.__STRIP__.logos" label="Logos" add-label="Add logo" reorder-label="Manage logos" reorder-title="Manage logos" add-open="bulk-edit" default-item="{&quot;name&quot;:&quot;New logo&quot;,&quot;asset&quot;:{&quot;name&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;source&quot;:&quot;user&quot;},&quot;logoFill&quot;:&quot;transparent&quot;,&quot;href&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;targetBlank&quot;:false,&quot;nofollow&quot;:false,&quot;alt&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" template="&lt;tooldrawer-field type=&quot;dropdown-upload&quot; size=&quot;md&quot; path=&quot;strips.__STRIP__.logos.__INDEX__.logoFill&quot; meta-path=&quot;strips.__STRIP__.logos.__INDEX__.asset&quot; label=&quot;Logo&quot; placeholder=&quot;Upload logo&quot; accept=&quot;image/*,.svg&quot; template=&quot;&amp;lt;tooldrawer-field type=&amp;quot;textfield&amp;quot; size=&amp;quot;sm&amp;quot; path=&amp;quot;strips.__STRIP__.logos.__INDEX__.name&amp;quot; label=&amp;quot;Name&amp;quot; placeholder=&amp;quot;Logo name&amp;quot; /&amp;gt;&amp;lt;tooldrawer-field type=&amp;quot;textfield&amp;quot; size=&amp;quot;sm&amp;quot; path=&amp;quot;strips.__STRIP__.logos.__INDEX__.caption&amp;quot; label=&amp;quot;Caption&amp;quot; placeholder=&amp;quot;Optional caption&amp;quot; /&amp;gt;&quot; /&gt;" />' />

<tooldrawer-field-content-logos group-label='' type='bulk-edit' size='md' path='strips' row-path='logos' label='Logo details...' title='Logo details' columns='[{"label":"Logo","path":"logoFill","metaPath":"asset","autoNamePath":"name","control":"upload","placeholder":"Upload logo","accept":"image/*,.svg"},{"label":"Name","path":"name","control":"text"},{"label":"Caption","path":"caption","control":"text"},{"label":"URL","path":"href","control":"text","placeholder":"https://example.com"},{"label":"Open in new tab","path":"targetBlank","control":"checkbox"},{"label":"Nofollow","path":"nofollow","control":"checkbox"},{"label":"Alt text","path":"alt","control":"text"},{"label":"Title (tooltip)","path":"title","control":"text"}]' />
</tooldrawer-cluster>
<tooldrawer-cluster show-if="type == 'carousel'">

<tooldrawer-field-carousel-settings group-label='' type='segmented' size='md' path='typeConfig.carousel.mode' label='Mode' options='[{"label":"Paged","value":"paged"},{"label":"Continuous","value":"continuous"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field-carousel-settings group-label='' type='segmented' size='md' path='typeConfig.carousel.step' label='Step' options='[{"label":"By logo","value":"logo"},{"label":"By page","value":"page"}]' show-if="typeConfig.carousel.mode == 'paged'" />
<tooldrawer-field-carousel-settings group-label='' type='toggle' size='md' path='typeConfig.carousel.showArrows' label='Show arrows' show-if="typeConfig.carousel.mode == 'paged'" />
<tooldrawer-field-carousel-settings group-label='' type='toggle' size='md' path='typeConfig.carousel.allowSwipe' label='Allow swipe/drag' show-if="typeConfig.carousel.mode == 'paged'" />
<tooldrawer-field-carousel-settings group-label='' type='toggle' size='md' path='typeConfig.carousel.autoplay' label='Autoplay' show-if="typeConfig.carousel.mode == 'paged'" />

<tooldrawer-field-carousel-settings group-label='' type='valuefield' size='md' path='typeConfig.carousel.autoSlideDelayMs' label='Autoplay delay (ms)' show-if="typeConfig.carousel.mode == 'paged' && typeConfig.carousel.autoplay == true" />
<tooldrawer-field-carousel-settings group-label='' type='valuefield' size='md' path='typeConfig.carousel.transitionMs' label='Transition (ms)' show-if="typeConfig.carousel.mode == 'paged'" />
<tooldrawer-field-carousel-settings group-label='' type='valuefield' size='md' path='typeConfig.carousel.speed' label='Speed (px/sec)' show-if="typeConfig.carousel.mode == 'continuous'" />

<tooldrawer-field-carousel-settings group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='typeConfig.carousel.direction' label='Direction' value='{{typeConfig.carousel.direction}}' options='[{"label":"Left","value":"left"},{"label":"Right","value":"right"}]' show-if="typeConfig.carousel.mode == 'continuous'" />
<tooldrawer-field-carousel-settings group-label='' type='toggle' size='md' path='typeConfig.carousel.pauseOnHover' label='Pause on hover' />
</tooldrawer-cluster>
</bob-panel>
<bob-panel id='layout'>
@slot:header-layout
<tooldrawer-cluster>
<tooldrawer-field-spacing-settings group-label='' type='slider' size='md' path='spacing.logoHeight' label='Logo size' min='40' max='400' />
<tooldrawer-field-spacing-settings group-label='' type='valuefield' size='md' path='spacing.gap' label='Logo gap (px)' />
<tooldrawer-field-spacing-settings group-label='' type='valuefield' size='md' path='spacing.rowGap' label='Row gap (px)' show-if="type == 'grid'" />
<tooldrawer-field-spacing-settings group-label='' type='valuefield' size='md' path='spacing.stripGap' label='Strip gap (px)' />
<tooldrawer-field-spacing-mobile group-label='' type='valuefield' size='md' path='spacing.mobileGap' label='Logo gap (mobile px)' />
<tooldrawer-field-spacing-mobile group-label='' type='valuefield' size='md' path='spacing.mobileStripGap' label='Strip gap (mobile px)' />
<tooldrawer-field-layout-behavior group-label='' type='toggle' size='md' path='behavior.randomOrder' label='Randomize logo order' />
</tooldrawer-cluster>
@slot:stagepod-layout
</bob-panel>
<bob-panel id='appearance'>
<tooldrawer-cluster>

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-logos group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.logoLook' label='Logo look' value='{{appearance.logoLook}}' options='[{"label":"Original","value":"original"},{"label":"Grayscale","value":"grayscale"}]' />
<tooldrawer-field-appearance-logos group-label='' type='valuefield' size='md' path='appearance.logoOpacity' label='Logo opacity (0-1)' />
</tooldrawer-cluster>
@slot:header-appearance
<tooldrawer-cluster label='Logo tile'>

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-item-card group-label='' type='dropdown-fill' size='md' fill-modes='color,gradient' path='appearance.itemBackground' label='Logo tile background' label-key='logoshowcase.labels.itemBackground' label-params='{"item":{"$t":"logoshowcase.item","count":1}}' value='{{appearance.itemBackground}}' />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-item-card group-label='' type='toggle' size='md' path='appearance.cardwrapper.radiusLinked' label='Link logo tile radius' label-key='logoshowcase.labels.linkItemRadius' label-params='{"item":{"$t":"logoshowcase.item","count":1}}' value='{{appearance.cardwrapper.radiusLinked}}' default='true' />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-item-card group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.cardwrapper.radius' label='Logo tile radius' label-key='logoshowcase.labels.itemRadius' label-params='{"item":{"$t":"logoshowcase.item","count":1}}' placeholder='Choose radius' value='{{appearance.cardwrapper.radius}}' show-if="appearance.cardwrapper.radiusLinked == true" options='[{"label":"None","value":"none"},{"label":"Small","value":"2xl"},{"label":"Medium","value":"4xl"},{"label":"Large","value":"6xl"},{"label":"X-Large","value":"10xl"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-item-card group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.cardwrapper.radiusTL' label='Logo tile top-left radius' label-key='logoshowcase.labels.itemTopLeftRadius' label-params='{"item":{"$t":"logoshowcase.item","count":1}}' placeholder='Choose radius' value='{{appearance.cardwrapper.radiusTL}}' show-if="appearance.cardwrapper.radiusLinked == false" options='[{"label":"None","value":"none"},{"label":"Small","value":"2xl"},{"label":"Medium","value":"4xl"},{"label":"Large","value":"6xl"},{"label":"X-Large","value":"10xl"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-item-card group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.cardwrapper.radiusTR' label='Logo tile top-right radius' label-key='logoshowcase.labels.itemTopRightRadius' label-params='{"item":{"$t":"logoshowcase.item","count":1}}' placeholder='Choose radius' value='{{appearance.cardwrapper.radiusTR}}' show-if="appearance.cardwrapper.radiusLinked == false" options='[{"label":"None","value":"none"},{"label":"Small","value":"2xl"},{"label":"Medium","value":"4xl"},{"label":"Large","value":"6xl"},{"label":"X-Large","value":"10xl"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-item-card group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.cardwrapper.radiusBR' label='Logo tile bottom-right radius' label-key='logoshowcase.labels.itemBottomRightRadius' label-params='{"item":{"$t":"logoshowcase.item","count":1}}' placeholder='Choose radius' value='{{appearance.cardwrapper.radiusBR}}' show-if="appearance.cardwrapper.radiusLinked == false" options='[{"label":"None","value":"none"},{"label":"Small","value":"2xl"},{"label":"Medium","value":"4xl"},{"label":"Large","value":"6xl"},{"label":"X-Large","value":"10xl"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-item-card group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.cardwrapper.radiusBL' label='Logo tile bottom-left radius' label-key='logoshowcase.labels.itemBottomLeftRadius' label-params='{"item":{"$t":"logoshowcase.item","count":1}}' placeholder='Choose radius' value='{{appearance.cardwrapper.radiusBL}}' show-if="appearance.cardwrapper.radiusLinked == false" options='[{"label":"None","value":"none"},{"label":"Small","value":"2xl"},{"label":"Medium","value":"4xl"},{"label":"Large","value":"6xl"},{"label":"X-Large","value":"10xl"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-item-card group-label='' type='dropdown-border' size='md' path='appearance.cardwrapper.border' label='Logo tile border' label-key='logoshowcase.labels.itemBorder' label-params='{"item":{"$t":"logoshowcase.item","count":1}}' value='{{appearance.cardwrapper.border}}' />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-item-card group-label='' type='dropdown-shadow' size='md' path='appearance.cardwrapper.shadow' label='Logo tile outside shadow' label-key='logoshowcase.labels.itemOutsideShadow' label-params='{"item":{"$t":"logoshowcase.item","count":1}}' value='{{appearance.cardwrapper.shadow}}' />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-item-card group-label='' type='toggle' size='md' path='appearance.cardwrapper.insideShadow.linked' label='Link logo tile inside shadows' label-key='logoshowcase.labels.linkItemInsideShadows' label-params='{"item":{"$t":"logoshowcase.item","count":1}}' value='{{appearance.cardwrapper.insideShadow.linked}}' default='true' />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-item-card group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.cardwrapper.insideShadow.layer' label='Inside shadow layer' value='{{appearance.cardwrapper.insideShadow.layer}}' options='[{"label":"Show below content","value":"below-content"},{"label":"Show above content","value":"above-content"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-item-card group-label='' type='dropdown-shadow' size='md' path='appearance.cardwrapper.insideShadow.all' label='Logo tile inside shadow' label-key='logoshowcase.labels.itemInsideShadow' label-params='{"item":{"$t":"logoshowcase.item","count":1}}' value='{{appearance.cardwrapper.insideShadow.all}}' show-if="appearance.cardwrapper.insideShadow.linked == true" />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-item-card group-label='' type='dropdown-shadow' axis='y' size='md' path='appearance.cardwrapper.insideShadow.top' label='Logo tile inside shadow (top)' label-key='logoshowcase.labels.itemInsideShadowTop' label-params='{"item":{"$t":"logoshowcase.item","count":1}}' value='{{appearance.cardwrapper.insideShadow.top}}' show-if="appearance.cardwrapper.insideShadow.linked == false" />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-item-card group-label='' type='dropdown-shadow' axis='x' size='md' path='appearance.cardwrapper.insideShadow.right' label='Logo tile inside shadow (right)' label-key='logoshowcase.labels.itemInsideShadowRight' label-params='{"item":{"$t":"logoshowcase.item","count":1}}' value='{{appearance.cardwrapper.insideShadow.right}}' show-if="appearance.cardwrapper.insideShadow.linked == false" />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-item-card group-label='' type='dropdown-shadow' axis='y' size='md' path='appearance.cardwrapper.insideShadow.bottom' label='Logo tile inside shadow (bottom)' label-key='logoshowcase.labels.itemInsideShadowBottom' label-params='{"item":{"$t":"logoshowcase.item","count":1}}' value='{{appearance.cardwrapper.insideShadow.bottom}}' show-if="appearance.cardwrapper.insideShadow.linked == false" />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-item-card group-label='' type='dropdown-shadow' axis='x' size='md' path='appearance.cardwrapper.insideShadow.left' label='Logo tile inside shadow (left)' label-key='logoshowcase.labels.itemInsideShadowLeft' label-params='{"item":{"$t":"logoshowcase.item","count":1}}' value='{{appearance.cardwrapper.insideShadow.left}}' show-if="appearance.cardwrapper.insideShadow.linked == false" />
</tooldrawer-cluster>
<tooldrawer-cluster label='Stage/Pod'>

<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='dropdown-fill' size='md' fill-modes='color,gradient,image,video' path='stage.background' label='Stage background' value='{{stage.background}}' />
<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='dropdown-shadow' size='md' path='stage.shadow' label='Stage outside shadow' value='{{stage.shadow}}' />
<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='toggle' size='md' path='stage.insideShadow.linked' label='Link stage inside shadows' value='{{stage.insideShadow.linked}}' default='true' />

<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='stage.insideShadow.layer' label='Inside shadow layer' value='{{stage.insideShadow.layer}}' options='[{"label":"Show below content","value":"below-content"},{"label":"Show above content","value":"above-content"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='dropdown-shadow' size='md' path='stage.insideShadow.all' label='Stage inside shadow' value='{{stage.insideShadow.all}}' show-if="stage.insideShadow.linked == true" />

<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='dropdown-shadow' axis='y' size='md' path='stage.insideShadow.top' label='Stage inside shadow (top)' value='{{stage.insideShadow.top}}' show-if="stage.insideShadow.linked == false" />

<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='dropdown-shadow' axis='x' size='md' path='stage.insideShadow.right' label='Stage inside shadow (right)' value='{{stage.insideShadow.right}}' show-if="stage.insideShadow.linked == false" />

<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='dropdown-shadow' axis='y' size='md' path='stage.insideShadow.bottom' label='Stage inside shadow (bottom)' value='{{stage.insideShadow.bottom}}' show-if="stage.insideShadow.linked == false" />

<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='dropdown-shadow' axis='x' size='md' path='stage.insideShadow.left' label='Stage inside shadow (left)' value='{{stage.insideShadow.left}}' show-if="stage.insideShadow.linked == false" />
<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='dropdown-fill' size='md' fill-modes='color,gradient,image,video' path='pod.background' label='Pod background' value='{{pod.background}}' />
<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='dropdown-shadow' size='md' path='pod.shadow' label='Pod outside shadow' value='{{pod.shadow}}' />
<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='toggle' size='md' path='pod.insideShadow.linked' label='Link pod inside shadows' value='{{pod.insideShadow.linked}}' default='true' />

<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='pod.insideShadow.layer' label='Inside shadow layer' value='{{pod.insideShadow.layer}}' options='[{"label":"Show below content","value":"below-content"},{"label":"Show above content","value":"above-content"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='dropdown-shadow' size='md' path='pod.insideShadow.all' label='Pod inside shadow' value='{{pod.insideShadow.all}}' show-if="pod.insideShadow.linked == true" />

<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='dropdown-shadow' axis='y' size='md' path='pod.insideShadow.top' label='Pod inside shadow (top)' value='{{pod.insideShadow.top}}' show-if="pod.insideShadow.linked == false" />

<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='dropdown-shadow' axis='x' size='md' path='pod.insideShadow.right' label='Pod inside shadow (right)' value='{{pod.insideShadow.right}}' show-if="pod.insideShadow.linked == false" />

<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='dropdown-shadow' axis='y' size='md' path='pod.insideShadow.bottom' label='Pod inside shadow (bottom)' value='{{pod.insideShadow.bottom}}' show-if="pod.insideShadow.linked == false" />

<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='dropdown-shadow' axis='x' size='md' path='pod.insideShadow.left' label='Pod inside shadow (left)' value='{{pod.insideShadow.left}}' show-if="pod.insideShadow.linked == false" />
@slot:stagepod-corners
</tooldrawer-cluster>
</bob-panel>
<bob-panel id='settings'>
<tooldrawer-cluster label='SEO/GEO'>
<tooldrawer-field-settings-seo group-label='' type='toggle' size='md' path='seoGeo.enabled' label='Enable SEO/GEO optimization' />
</tooldrawer-cluster>
<tooldrawer-cluster label='Clickeen Branding'>
<tooldrawer-field-settings-behavior group-label='' type='toggle' size='md' path='behavior.showBacklink' label='Show Made with Clickeen' />
</tooldrawer-cluster>
</bob-panel>
